review: We've now had this item for 6 weeks, and we have had issues with it from the get go. We thought at first that it was our TV or internet connection; however, after extensive trial and error, the issue lies within this device. Every minute or two after the device powers on, the display goes out and the tv no longer recognizes that the device is plugged in. We have used both the HDMI adapter and just plugging the stick into the TV itself. There is definitely something wrong with the HDMI connection. I understand that these things happen, so we were just hoping to get a replacement. Unfortunately, the customer service is HORRIBLE. The device has a 1 year warranty; however, when I call, I just get transferred to 5 different people who all ask me the same questions and try to diagnose the issue. Nobody has ever offered to replace the faulty item.
